userCmt: Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, phòng gần bãi biển , giá cả với cùng hợp lí

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Rất ưng ý, hiếm khi nào mà lên đánh giá một cái gì đó nhưng mà thật sự rất ưng ý ks, từ nhân viên lễ tân tới chú bảo vệ. Khách sạn không to lắm nhưng rất là sạch sẽ, trang thiết bị vẫn còn mới. View phòng của tôi đặt nhìn ra biển, đi bộ ra biển cũng gần luôn. Lần sau có ghé nha trang thì tôi sẽ quay lại.

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: - chổ để xe hạn chế ( đi ô tô đừng thuê ở đây vì ks trong hẻm ) - nhân viên lễ tân không thân thiện, gặp nhân viên lễ tân ngày đầu còn tỏ vẻ khó chịu. Khách sạn bụi không.

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Phòng sạch sẽ, thuận tới tháp trầm hương. Đi khu vực trung tâm thuận lợi. Tuy nhiên phòng tắm hơi bất tiện

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Tôi và gia đình rất hài lòng khi đặt khách sạn mình. Nhân viên vui vẻ, đặc biệt các chú bảo vệ rất nhiệt tình và tốt bụng, vui vẻ. Sẽ ủng hộ tiếp những lần đến nha trang.

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Phòng vệ sinh rất hôi, vệ sinh phòng mỗi ngày nhưng không thay đổi.

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Phong sach se, nhan vien nhiet tinh

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: - phòng ở giống hình, sạch sẽ, các tiện nghi thiết kế cách tinh gọn, hiện đại. View vẫn đảm bảo nhìn ra biển. Tuy nhiên dọn phòng mình thấy khá trễ so với những khách sạn khác mình từng lưu trú (gần 13g trưa mình đi tham quan buổi sáng về nhưng vẫn chưa dọn phòng ( ( ) - vị trí gần biển, các khu vui chơi và ăn uống. - bữa ăn sáng khá đơn giản, bình thường. - dịch vụ thuê xe ok, xe chạy êm. - bác bảo vệ ở đây rất nhiệt tình nè! mình ấn tượng bác bảo vệ luôn!

hotelName: Khách sạn New Sun Nha Trang
userCmt: Khách sạn thoáng sạch, nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện. Cũng dễ đi lại thuận tiện

I ordered a ocean view with balcony and room for 3 adults superior deluxe and they told me the room i ordered was deluxe i told them no i ordered bigger room they try no i ordered deluxe so i showed them the comfortmation with the room info so they said give them a minute. Then they said we are going to up grade me but still put me is a deluxe room with 3 adults my bathroom is bigger at my home we were cramp.the rooms need of repairs paint is peeling the hot water runs out before you finish bathing the phone plug falls out the phone and the balcony was very small.every morning you have to go to the receptionist to get you tickets for breakfast the breakfast was good that was the only thing i really liked i have stayed in alot nicer hotel on the other side of town for half the price
There are convenient location.

Ich verbrachte 6 nächte in dem hotel. Sauberkeit und freundliches personal erwarten die gäste. Der pool liegt von der straße abgewandt und hat erst am nachmittag sonne. Am strand ist es sehr windig und baden nicht ungefährlich. Man sagte mir jedoch, dass ich zur falschen jahreszeit da sei ( ende januar, anfang februar )

Läget är bra och nära stranden, ca 10 minuters promenad till backpackerområdet där de flesta restauranger och barer finns. Stranden precis utanför är helt ok, men vi föredrog att promenera en bit längre söderut där det fanns lite trevligare standstolar att hyra, sailing club rekommenderas. Det är mycket trafik utanför men vi bodde på en våning högt upp så det störde inte. Ska tilläggas att det är den högljudda trafiken är oundviklig oavsett var i stan man bor. Hotellet var rent och fräscht och personalen var hjälpsam. Frukostbuffén hade ett brett utbud och maten var förhållandevis bra. Nha trang lodge hotell rekommenderas för de som önskar hålla sig utanför det turistiga backpackerområdet och bo bekvämt för en prisvärd peng.

We stayed 3 nights during tet. We were on the 12th floor with a beautiful ocean view but the noise from the street below was a little distracting. The staff were great and the overall facility was nice. The breakfast was above average but the staff sometimes cleared plates and glasses without asking if you were done. The location was good for sightseeing because there were taxis and other means of transportation available to take you to the various attractions..

I had a very nice stay here, definitely exceeded my expectations considering the price. The hotel is located across the road from the beach and a lot of restaurants/shops are nearby. Decent pool which gets the sun all afternoon and was never busy. Hotel arranged car to the airport for me for about 14 which i thought was reasonable considering the distance. If you want groceries/general items then turn left out of the hotel and walk (about 5mins) until you get to the nha trang centre where there is a small supermarket with a lot more choice as well as being cheaper than the small shops. Overall good value for money
Gammalt och slitet. Vårt rum hade fläckar på mattan och allmänt slitet. Liten balkong utan möbler. God frukost. Hotellet har bra läge men vi hade förväntat oss lite bättre standard

Overpriced. Half of the facilities were no existant ie. Spa, suana and health club. If you get a deluxe suite with tub the tub can only be filled with about 3 inches of water before the hot runs out. Also got food poisoning from the restaurant and i can garuantee it was from there as it was the only place i ate. Would never stay there again.

키박스가 고장나서 고쳐달랬는데 안고쳐졌는데 고쳐졌대요 고맙다고했더니 흥하고 가네요 지하일층 마사지하는데서 마사지 받았는데 이것들이 팁을 마사지값보다 더 달라네요?황당 그리고 카운터서 여숙박객 전체 여권을 받더니 체크아웃때가져가래요 또 황당 잠깐 머물려한곳이라 다행이다 싶더라구요 왜 삼성급인지?궁금하네요 객실은 그럭저럭 나쁘진 않았지만 서비스와 태도가 엉망입니다 마사지 샵은 시원하지도 않고 돈만밝히는곳인듯해요 다시는 안가고 싶어요

Stayed for 2 nights and chose this hotel because of its location. The building is very dated and very little maintenance from what i can see. Their towels have holes in them, sink with stains, and cockroach on every counter. The only two thing that keeps the hotel in business is really their location and gorgeous view. By the way, dance music can be heard until midnight from the bars along the street. Would not recommend to couples or families.
ニャチャン駅からもタクシーで数分 またビーチへは徒歩で 某航空会社の乗務員の指定ホテルにもなっているので ベトナム国内での評価の良いのではと思われる
Very convenient location and spacious rooms

Terrible. Hotel and its facilities are from the soviet s era. Old and dirty. Night club is right at the basement and music is blasting till 3am. For the price we paid (80aud), there are plenty other good hotels around. Avoid at all cost!!!
Great location, and buffet service good

This is probably one of the most affordable hotels on the beachfront and really good value for money. It s different from more modern hotels in terms of room design etc, but i like these old hotels in vietnam - spacious, with dark furniture. Location is convenient if you are coming by train and there s often no need to call a taxi, since some will be right in front of the hotel. I just wish they had more vegetarian/ vegan options for breakfast. I told the staff and on the next day it was significantly better.

ニャチャンでは 古くからあるホテルですが 周りの最新のホテルと比べなければ それほど 古さは感じませんが さすがに 水周りは 一歩 劣る感じがします ロケーションは ニャチャンのど真ん中で 海岸のすぐ前に建っていますが 海岸で 朝早くから 体操をしているグループがいて 朝早くから 結構 掛け声や 音楽が聞こえました 朝食は ベトナムのホテルは フォーなどの麺類が定番ですが 本当に毎朝 日替わりで 同じものが出てくることは無く 他のメニューも それほど変わったものは出ませんが 毎日 ちょっと変えていて 頑張ってくれている感じがします
Good location floor running down, too old smell

L hôtel est en face de la mer, le panorama ciel mer terre est sublime. Les services sont accueillant et chaleureux. Le petit déjeuner est généreux , plusieurs choix. L ensemble de hôtel est très satisfaisant ! merci
El lugar está bueno para su precio. El wifi es muy, pero muy malo.
Very very good hotel
Tutto perfetto consigliato vi invito a prenotare qui.......
Very old hotel
立地が良く 食事をするのも ビーチに行くのも便利でした チェックイン時間前でも 快く受け付けてくれました バスルームで少し水漏れしていました 周辺レストランが大音量で音楽を流しているため 夜はうるさいです

お気に入りポイント ①価格が安い その割に朝食も良く毎日メニューも変化し 品数も豊富です ②ロケーションが良い ナイトマーケットやローカル食堂に近い ③部屋からの眺めが良い ビーチ眼前です ④お好きな方にはカジノも併設してます 残念ポイント ①専用のビーチエリアが無い だからパラソル チェアーは借りなくてはならない 有料 ②朝食のバウチャーを毎日ロビーまで取りに行かなくてはならない ③プールが小さい 12,5mx5mくらいかな
Staff really friendly and helpful. Room had great view and being next to beach was great. Room although a little date nice and represented excellent value for price
Good location with low cost. Beach side is just 2 mins by walk.
Очень хорошее расположение. Неплохой сервис. Сам отель конечно староват, но для спокойного интересного отдыха подходит.
シャワーの水圧が悪い 部屋によっては排水も悪いかな なので 風呂には入りにくい 海に入ったら ホテルのプールで砂を落としてから部屋の風呂に入る必要がある でも ロケーションはとってもいいです
The service here is amazing. A bunch of shops and restaurants are within walking distance, not the mention the beach being right across from the hotel. I will definitely be staying here again.
Clean and comfortable, with a beautiful view
Très contente pour les services et le bon emplacement pour les plages de baignades. L hôtel est belle mais a besoin de rénover pour s adapter aux autres.
4泊5日の滞在しました ロケーション コスパ最高でした部屋はスーペリアルーム シービュー ベットに付いてですが これは個人出来な感覚ですがマットが硬過ぎた為安眠できなかった お勧め出来るホテルです
We liked the location, super nice staff, room was great. There is nothing to complain about. We definitely will stay again.

Personalet var noget af det bedst og venlige jeg har mødt, de var altid høflige og venlige og imødekommende. Hotellet er gammelt og lidt slidt. Men bliver opvejet at personalet. Hotellet er beliggende meget centralt, hvilket også er et plus .

Everything was just perfect. The view, the cleaning, location.. The only problem is taking shower. You have to sit in the bath which doesn t look clean and have to hold the shower head with one hand because it s not long enough to stand up and there is no a hanger to put . Very uncomfortable.

I travel extensively but it was my first time in nha trang i found the hotel perfectly located to access beach n restaurants night market malls the breakfast was very nice with mixture of asian n western foods the room rates were amazing cheap for what was provided we will definitely be back the staff were pleasant and helpful clearly a must visit for anyone to appreciate i resort luxury day spa amazing vinpearl tata show wow cable car experience riding electric scooter was safe do yourself a huge favour and visit and stay at this hotel ray from australia
Location is good but overall not very clean
There were a few issues with the booking, the hotel itself was not in great condition, breakfast was limited, staff were not friendly.

Hôtel parfaitement situé, à proximité des restaurants, bars, massage, etc.. Devant une superbe plage de sable bordée de cocotiers, et d un marché de nuit très fréquenté. Notre chambre au 11e étage avait une vue splendide sur la baie. Chambre avec coffre, frigo, tv 5 monde, mais une seule carte d accès. Le petit déjeuner buffet est exceptionnel et surtout asiatique, mais rien ne manque fruits, lait, café etc. Le chef cuisinier toujours présent et toujours prêt à nous guider. D une manière générale personnel discret mais efficace et prévenant.
Sentral beliggenhet, både i forhold til strand og sentrum, svært bra frokost. Daglig sengetøyskifte. Standard rom med noe liten balkong.

Great location on the beach, too bad for lower floor guestrooms above the raging basement club. Good breakfast buffet with many options and good quality but very crowded at all times. Staff was generally friendly and helpful. Inconsistent wifi but your on the beach and there s plenty of nightlife so you shouldn t be in the hotel much anyways. For what its worth, mainly russians staying here.
Rooms not clean buffet basic in comparison to other hotels would not stay there again.

A good clean hotel across the road from beach and a very short walk to loads of restaurants and shops/markets. Can walk to cathedral and buddha temple. Short taxi ride to via pearl island/theme park. Good for a day with 10yr olds and teenagers etc. Breakfast supplied and was great with good service. Rooms a little tired but clean. We had and executive deluxe room which was on the very front with fantastic views worth the few extra dollars. Lots of russians stay here in nahtrang as it is a holiday destination for them.
직원들 서비스며 객실 상태, 조식 메뉴의 다양화 등 전체적으로 괜찮은 편이었음. 한가지 아쉬웠던 점은 지하에 클럽이 있어 낮은 층 또는 클럽이 위치해 있는 라인의 경우 약간 시끄러운 단점이 있음. 소음에 부담없는 분들에겐 적극 추천하지만 민감한 분들은 클럽이 없는 호텔을 이용하면 좋을듯 함.
The room felt like it had not been updated in 20 years. Breakfast which was included was terrible.

Good service from hotel staff. But their massage centre downstairs was dodgy offered terrible service. The manager didn t speak much english she was eating when we came in still was when we came out. We bought a package which included spa, sauna, massage a light meal with water tea. None of the food or beverages were offered. We were left in the cold air-conditioned room for about 7mins while the girls went to get some warm stones. Sauna wasn t turned on, spa wasn t heated. We ended up leaving half way through the package. Full price was still charged even though we spoke to the hotel manager. Very dissappointed..

Полная разруха в номерах, грязные стены и ковровое покрытие, дырявые простыни, подушки похожие на кирпичи. Отсутствие звукоизоляции окон, а ведь отель стоит на пересечении двух оживленных дорог с постоянно бибикающими скутерами. Уборщицы вваливающиеся в номер в половине восьмого утра.

Dated hotel in need of a refurb. But for 30/night. (late booking via expedia) was ok. Great breskfast buffet though. Awesome spread. Opposite the beach so good location. Needs double glazing, even from the 7th floor the traffic noise (horns) is very loud. Lots of russians too!

We decided to book a suite so we had plenty of space, and it was outstanding - fantastic view through fabulous floor to ceiling windows, great sized room and friendly staff. We absolutely loved our stay there and will definitely do so again. Some reviews say it is getting a bit tired and i guess i know what they mean, and if 5 star flashiness is important to you, go somewhere else. But the room we had was perfect and the location outstanding right across from the beach and very central to everywhere we wanted to go. Breakfasts were good. Do be aware that the hotel is not double glazed so if there is noise outside you will hear some of it. And the hotel has a night club and a bit of the bass sound reached the room - but not enough to keep us awake.
One of the best view i ever had from my hotel room is really feel like a wonderful place to be i can t wait to be there again an again

Arriving late one evening we were greeted by beautiful friendly smiles and an up grade to deluxe rooms overlooking beaches, mountains and city night lights ! enjoyed a late evening seafood dinner from room service with no fuss about the lateness of the hour . Any minor issues with rooms were dealt with speedily next morning . Staff continued to check if we were happy with our rooms , service etc. The buffet breakfast ( included ) offered ample choices for us - and as we were late risers any foods that had already run out were usually replenished when we asked . The décor echoes the style of the late 90 s - when it was built - but it seems to be very well maintained despite being opposite the beach and all the problems that creates ! as i am living in vietnam , i will happily return to nha trang lodge hotel and my australian friend will praise it to all her friends visiting vietnam .
Good service great location ... Bathroom was dated but all in all great hotel
Järkyttävä jumputus paikallisesta diskosta joka ilta klo 00.30. Liikenteen melu kuului huoneeseen. Henkilökunta ei ollut ystävällistä.

ビーチ沿いの道に面しており 食事 ビーチへのアクセスはいいです チェックイン時にフロントの係に3fや4fの部屋は外の音がうるさいから上のフロアに移った方がいいと言われ差額を提示されました 交渉次第で半額以下になりますが 結果的にはこのオファーに乗って正解でした 夜になると1f/b1のクラブのズンズン ドンドンする騒音が深夜3時まで聞こえてきます 上層階でも多少聞こえますが低層階はもっとうるさいと思います 変更した部屋はジュニアスイートで十分広く角部屋 2面窓で最高のビューでした 1fのレストランは大陸の宿泊者で占拠され係も対応が出来ていない様子だったので すぐ近くのcafeでベトナムコーヒーを楽しみました ビュッフェの朝食が付きますが期待しないように
No good
Vị trí gần biển, nhân viên nhiệt tình, phòng bình dân, hợp lý để ở khi đi công tác. Dậy sớm dạo biển hợp lý.
Ở phòng 1 giường lớn có ban công nhìn ra biển rất đẹp phòng thoáng, gió mát gởi xe oto hơi khó khăn thiết kế phòng tắm lâu rút nước, không được sạch sẽ

Ko hiểu sao ks có 3.4 sao chứ mình vs gia đình đặt thấy giá rất rẻ mà còn thoải mái mát và thơm nữa, ks có cả hồ bơi nữa, nhà vs có bồn tắm đẹp sạch view nhìn ra đường phố, mình ở tầng 3 thấy rất hài lòng, chuẩn bị mọi thứ rất đầy đủ chỉnh chu, đây có lẽ là cái ks mình thấy ưng nhất trong suốt thời gian đi du lịch

Mình thích khách sạn này vì có view đẹp, nhìn được thẳng ra biển. Phục vụ tốt, nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng mình ở dù nhỏ nhưng lại sạch sẽ và tiện nghi. Tuy nhiên cửa nhà vệ sinh lại ko đóng được, đóng mà nó cứ bị lỏng. Trên tầng 15 có hồ bơi nhưng rất vắng vì thường họ ra biển tắm. Khách sạn cùng có nhà hàng nhưng mình thấy nhà hàng bây giờ đóng cửa, không ăn trực tiếp được, chỉ có thể ở phòng rồi gọi nhân viên sẽ mang thức ăn tới phòng. Và khách sạn này cũng có dịch vụ thuê xe máy
Ks chỉ tầm 2 sao, dịch vụ kém. Nước uống để trong nhà vệ sinh. Phòng bí không view. Không có ăn sáng. Bể bơi nhỏ xíu và rất kém. Giá đắt. Được cái gần biển và công viên
Breakfast food quality was poor.
Lovely modern hotel in great location and lovely staff
친구들이랑 놀러가서 묵었습니다. 전체적으로 말끔했습니다. Private beach를 가보지 못해서 아쉽지만, 위치가 좋아서 놀러다니기 바빴기 때문에 후회는 없습니다.

Spent a few days in nha trang - getting the kids padi certified and happy to spend time at the regalia. Nice staff, clean hotel, excellent breakfast and convenient location right across from the beach. Not a particularly relaxing hotel as the hustle bustle of the road in front creates a very urban background noise but still a pleasant place and great value for the money.

When we were ready to check in, the receptionist said the booking doesn t exist without double checked.under request,she discovered there was some problem existed in their network. After that, i was so surprised they arranged me and my boyfriend a two single beds room instead of any consultation and actually the price i paid allows me to choose either single bed or one big bed room. Many facilities are very old in the room and different from the pictures shows online,like the blue carpet looks dirty,the sprinkler head is leaking water when it is turned on, the air conditioner keeps in the same level which is not allowed to be tuned. When we check out, another matter happened.we hope to change 50 us into vtd but the reception girl counted it in lower rate than the hotel listed rate on paper.the manner of she that who wears glasses was really bad,in the process,she has not even said thank you, sorry,and smile. Later, she said there was no small numbers vtd for changing and still asked us to give her the 50 us. I will not be mad if the hotel is only a 2/3 stars hotel.
The staffs at the reception was pretty kind and loved their service!
Kjempefint hotel, nydelig rom! badebasseng på tak er litt lite så her er det ikke plass til mange. Vi spurte etter hotel baren og fikk beskjed om at de ikke hadde det (den var i 16 etg...)
Value for except front desk staff doesnt speak english but very helpful. Room have a nice view and clean bathroom.
I love this hotel. Private spot at the beach were they give you chair, umbrella towel. Breakfast is great. Room was great.
酒店房间设施很新 非常干净 有浴缸和海景阳台 酒店的早餐不太好 好多都是凉的 早上吃起来很不舒服 服务还不错 都比较热情 位置离热闹的地方略微远了点儿 总体很不错 性价比很高
빈펄리조트 가기 전날 예약한 호텔 아침 식사는 별로였음 방 상태는 깨끗하고 괜찮았음 가격을 고려하면, 상당히 추천할 만한 호텔
비치가 바로 앞 시작되는 지점에 있어서 뷰가 너무 예쁨. 해안이 전체적으로 눈에 들어옴. 호텔앞 프라이빗 비치도 있어서 좋았음. 룸도 넓은편임. 옥상 수영장은 이쁘지만 좀 작은편이나 한눈에 뷰를 볼수있어서 좋음. 리셉션이 친절하지가 않고 상당히 무뚝뚝해서 좋지 않았음. 조식 부페도 괜찮았음.
Great staff, really felt welcome. Clean, well outgittee and very comfortable.
Nice hotel with great straff clean roms and good beds
Good

Ett hotell i ryssarnas paradis. Allting är på ryska... Frukosten består av varmrätter snarare än frukost (tex pasta carbonara). Otrevlig personal vid stranden som försöker tjäna pengar på tjänster som enligt receptionen ska vara gratis...
ベトナム型のペンシル-ホテルです シービュー以外だと 周辺の 建設ラッシュで夜間まで煩い場合 有り お値段 部屋からの海側眺望 海の近さでお勧め フロント職員は 英語問題無し ロシア語も同様 残念なのは 食事場所など町の 中心まで徒歩5-6分かかる所 近所ではベトナム料理主体です ホテルのせいでは無いですが それらokなら総じてお勧めできます
Trevligt hotell men lite för långt från centrum. Trevlig strand utanför hotellet. Måste korsa en trafikerad väg för att komma dit. Strandpromenad.
Big clean hotel room with seaview. Nice beach. Not crowded. Close proximity to vinpearl. However noisy in the morning due to construction works
베낭여행중에 묵었지만 숙박료에 비해 정말괜찮은 호텔입니다 한국인이 거의 없는 호텔 임에도 불구하고 원하면 아침식사뷔페에 한국 음식을 준비 해 줄수 있다고 하네요. 그리고 짐을 맡겨놓고 관광하도록 배려도 해주고요 빈펄 리조트가기도 편하고 특히 길건널때 안전요원이 배치되어 있어서 괜찮았습니다
Perfect for using to see all the sights or to use as a base further a-field, safe, friendly and reliable staff, perfect hotel for all our needs

Hotel is well located very close to the beach (150m to the waterline). We were on the 12th floor with sea views and a small balcony, be way though, there is significant road noise (horns) all night. Room was clean and tidy and the small pool on the roof was ok - the photos are a little misleading. Breakfast was average but more than adequate. There are some great restaurants within easy walking distance. There was a large russian contingent at the hotel and the area carters largely for them. Overall the hotel was more than adequate and i d stay again.
酒店大堂服務員的服務非常好 無論入住 退房或交通與旅遊安排都非常細心 特別是大堂yen小姐 住的海景露台房 能遠眺整個沙灘 非常美 房間整潔 交通方便 整體感覺很好 值得推薦
５泊しましたが こちらの色々な勘違いなどにも親切に対応してくれて とってもフレンドリーなスタッフでした お部屋もきれいで 朝食も美味しかったです ビーチまでも近くて便利でした スタッフの皆さん お世話になりました ありがとうございました

Just across the street from the beach, has a beach area with umbrellas. All toiletries in the room. Very clean. Hotel staff very accommodating and polite, speak multiple languages including english and russian. Strongly recommended

The hotel is ok , but based on the money we pay i expected it should be better the so called private beach is crossed the street, which is ok, but for hotel guests still need to pay for the chair and towel, this is ridiculous breakfast buffet is great we had two big beds for 4 people with city view. The room is small.the city view is actually looking at the roofs of other smaller hotels, not a pretty view

L hôtel est correct dans son ensemble, mais sans charme. Tout fonctionne bien, mais c est un peu l usine russe! ce qui est surement le cas de la majorité des hôtels, nah trang étant une ville totalement envahie par les russes. De plus lors de notre passage début mars 2017, il y avait un immeuble en construction juste en face. Sans commentaire sur le bruit!! a mon avis c est la ville entière qui ne présente aucun intérêt.
I chose regalia for the last day in nha trang. This hotel is a new ones, with good condition and cleaness. The breakfast is delicous, too. This hotel has a private beach area, i love it.

酒店不大算是精致干净 接待懂中文的女生有点凶 顶层有泳池和美式桌球 酒店每个房间提供一张正对海滩躺椅的一次使用券 早餐水果和越南食品丰富 法棍特别和濛粉都很不错 定的海景房 风景不错 一个小小的阳台也可凭栏眺望 每天提供两小瓶水 wifi速度快 就是隔音不好 清晨和夜晚楼下马路的车声特别响亮 定了一件标间和一间大床房 强烈建议标间的双床房 卫生间和房间都大很多 没有什么团队 安静 离开时前台约车比出租车划算 酒店位置去哪里都比较方便
Very clean and friendly

Do not stay here. Not only are the photos deceiving but the aircon does not work, the room safe was broken, and we only had 1 working lift to service 16 floors. It was a 10min wait for the lift or hiking up and down 16 floors. Not ideal in 33degree heat. The hotel is rundown, as is the outdoor pool (located on the 16th floor. If you are scared of heights, i would not recommend as it is a small area and surrounded by a not so tall glass fence). The sun lounges were falling apart and stained. Reception and management were dismissive of our complaints and unprepared to come to a resolution. They would not give us a refund - even when we offered to pay for 1night as a courtesy. We cancelled our booking (which was for 5nights), and chose to stay at vesna hotel up the road. When contacting lastminute.com they advised that as the hotel had not agreed to waive the refund policy there was nothing they could do and suggested we return to the regalia hotel. As part of this the regalia hotel also advised that they were still expecting us despite the fact we had confirmed with reception and management in-person that we were cancelling the booking by checking out as a result of the conditions of the hotel. This in itself feels like a scam as because we did not cancel online, the booking was still active, therefore, we were liable for the full 5 days. According to lastminute.com, if we had cancelled on the day that we checked out, this would not have been the case. Pity we were unaware.

This hotel was excellent value for money. The room was clean and comfortable. There was a rooftop pool which catches the sun in the morning . Their breakfast had an omelette and pancake station and was included in the pice very central to bats and restaurants.
Stayed 5 nights. Friendly staffs, i had an issue with the bathroom and ngan (the receptionist) was able to fix it right away. Will definitely be back.
We had ocean view front room, very clean. Staff were nice and professional. Buffet food was excellent. It was worth every penny for the cost of hotel.
Surtout ne pas y aller on a passer 2 nuits au lieu de 6 donc on a perdu 4 nuits hôtel. Com au une réponse
Good location and also convenient .staff very friendly
Ett helt ok hotell men skulle dessvärre inte boka det igen. Poolen kändes inte så fräsch. Boendet saknade gym vilket va synd. Frukosten va inte bra
酒店位置方便 房間潔淨 早餐也不錯 員工服務態度很好 但面對著停車場 每天早上很嘈吵 房間隔音差 而且大堂有点舊

Отличное расположение! море через дорогу, а до центра 10-20 минут. Вокруг множество кафе и магазинов. Номер с прямым видом на море великолепен. Очень удобные кровати, высыпались как никогда. Вкусные завтраки. Персонал вежливый и предупредительный. Спасибо за ланч бокс, который выдали нам в день отъезда, поскольку не успевали на завтрак. Если когда-нибудь вернусь в нячанг, то только сюда.
Very good service

L hotel aurait besoin d un peu de rénovations, il y a de la moisissure dans la salle de bain, le bain était défectueux, le plancher avant des taches de rouille. Le mini frigo sentait très mauvais et la télé n avait que trois stations sur 70 en anglais.

Ligger nära stranden men även precis vid en stor bullrig gata där trafiken kör dygnet runt. Alla fordon kommunicerar med sina tutor, vilket höll oss vakna om nätterna. För övrigt väldigt trevlig personal och fina rum.
Olin 6 päivää, muttei vuodevaatteita vaihdettu kertaakaan. Hyvä aamiainen. Ihan ok hotelli ja hyvällä paikalla.

The location is very good, it is walking distance from the center of town. Also, it is just across from the beach. The staffs are very nice. There is one thing that they need to fix is the bathtub. The tub was not install correctly, it was not sealed around, so when you take a shower, the water follows the gaps and floods the floor. And this makes the bathroom floor is very wet. Eventually, it will ruin the floor of that floor and the ceiling of the floor below. This will be a big problem for the hotel.
海がすぐ目の前で椰子の木がたくさんありランニングも日本より涼しくてランニングの後に海で遊べて最高でした プールは小さくて楽しめなかったが景色はニャチャンビーチを見渡せてとてもきれいで思い出の景色になりました

Khách sạn mới, nội thất đẹp, sạch sẽ .chúng tôi được nâng cấp lên phòng suit, quang cảnh đẹp có thề nhìn thấy cả vòng cung biển trần phú, nha trang. Nhân viên thái độ thân thiện, tận tình. Phòng ăn hơi quá tải khi có khách đoàn. Không có chổ đậu xe hơi riêng. Tuy nhiên có bãi đậu xe công cộng đối diện. Cám ơn hotels.com
Good , thank for staf
Easy location
직원분들이 매우 친절하고 방을 city view로 예약했었는데 ocean view로 무료로 바꿔주어서 너무 근사한 view를 즐길 수 있었습니다. 방도 매우 깔끔하고 좋았습니다. Family deluxe room이라 약간 좁긴 했지만 그 밖에는 정말 만족스러웠습니다. 시내 중심도 가깝고 제공된 조식도 좋았으며 전반적으로 강력 추천하고 싶은 호텔입니다.
Very good breakfast and helpful staff great location
호텔시설은 보통이나 시내접근성 해변 접근성이 좋아 가성비 좋고 야외 활동이 주가되는 젊은이 들에게는 어울리는 호텔이네요.

The property was very clean. As soon as we arrived the staff on reception were very polite and upgraded our room to the suite without us even asking which was lovely. The hotel itself is in a great location and they have a roof top pool. The only reason i would not give this 5 stars is because the pool is very small (which we knew before booking) and there was no sun after 2/3pm because of the way it is designed. But overall an excellent stay!
Clean , friendly staff, convenient location to the beach
Un hotel perfecto para nuestras necesidades. Locacion perfecta. Lo mejor de todo, la atencion del personal.
Only stayed one night. Arrived at 11pm so no time for anything but sleep and check out. A bit noisy. Breakfast ok but not great.
전반적으로 깔끔하고 좋았어요 위치가 좋아서 신투어리스트 여행 다니기에도 좋았어요.
호텔이 깨끗하고 위치가 좋아요. 주변에 맛있는 식당도 많고 해변이 가까이 있어서 밤에도 안전하게 관광할 수 있어요. 조식 쌀국수가 맛있어요.
수영장이 사진이랑 많이 달라서 좀 실망했지만 그래도 전체저으로 괜찮았어요 방음이 좀 안되긴해요
다른 후기 추천 받아서 하루밤 잠만 자려고 왓는데 그냥 5 10만원대 한국 모텔 수준입니다 물론 침구나 시설 하나하나가 좋은 편이지만 작은 호텔이라 쾌적한 유지가 아쉽네요 객실내 오래된 습한 펜션 같은 곳에서의 냄새가 나고

This is our second stay at rosaka.it is not very old.the staff are very nice.the receptionist diem was lovely.bed very comfortable,breakfast was ok but not as good as previous stay also at our previous stay the hotel manager was very good checked with the guests to see if all was good but this time we didn t know who the manager was.excellent little roof top swimming pool.fitness room well equipped.unfortunatly bigger hotels are now blocking some sea views.good location
清潔でよかったです
친절하고, 시내에 있어서 주변 관광하기 좋고, 편리합니다.
깨끗하고 조용하면 전반적으로 만족 하며 호텔 주변 10분 거리 안에 맛집과 문화시설들이 있어 활동하기가 좋음
뭐그닥.. 수영장 개오바 .. 뭐그닥.. 수영장 개오바 .. 뭐그닥.. 수영장 개오바 .. 뭐그닥.. 수영장 개오바 ..
조식이 맛있었다 대체로 깔끔하고 괜찮았습니다
위치도 좋고 직원분들도 친절함. 청소가 깨끗하지는 않음. 스파마사지는 비추.

I ve never seen hotel staff that is more caring, nicer and friendlier. I ve stayed at many hotels so far in different parts of the world, but the staff i met in rosaka nha trang hotel was by far the best. They were extremely helpful and if we said we needed one thing, they would not only help us with that but take care of other things that we might need or were going to ask later. I was so impressed with their hospitality and kindness. I d like to say thanks to mr. Nam and mr. Vi (the guy with glasses, who speaks good english) personally. It was my first time visiting vietnam and thanks to you, i could start my trip in vietnam with great joy. When i visit nha trang later, i ll definitely go to rosaka hotel again. Thank you sooooo much and hope to see you guys soon! ) ) )
에어컨이 됐다안됐다함 미침! 룸키는 하나씩밖에 안줘서 밖에 나가려면 키를 빼고나가야하는데 모든전원이 다나감 핸드폰충전도못함 냉장고도 전원이나가서 전혀안시원함 깨끗하기는함 조식먹을꺼별루없음
位置方便 離su spa超近 酒店對面就有便利店 步行到海邊也不算遠 職員有善 早餐熟食一般 即煮越河是我唯一的選擇 其他的真的不太合胃口 水果有5,6款 住宿期間泳池維修 不能使用 房間整潔 會有小水果盤 有香蕉 提子 但浴室有味道 未至於要求換房 但住了幾天味道都散不了
이용하면서 기분 좋았고 너무나 만족했습니다. 특히 스파 저렴하게 좋은 서비스 받아서 여행 피로함이 싹 풀렸습니다.
Just enjoyed 3 days there and really enjoyed it.great facilities ,fantastic staff could not do enough for us would definitely recommend....
룸을 업그레이드해주어서 전망좋은방에서 잘 지내다가 왔습니다 주위에 식당카페 바 마트등이 즐비해서 여행하기 편리합니다.

5 ieme sejour au rosaka. Acceuil du personnel toujours au top!!!! propreté ,emplacement et infrastructures au top!!! nam, membre du personnel est toujours aussi serviable ,souriant et avenant. Un des superviseurs parle parfaitement francais ! nous y retournerons .
Clean and tidy. Convenient to everything. Staff helpful.
Well maintained hotel room and the rooftop swimming pool is excellent.

Das hotel wurde vor 3 monaten neu eröffnet und das merkt man. Gut gelegen inmitten einer geschäftigen straße, aber nicht zu laut. Der strand ist auch in wenigen minuten erreichbar. Das frühstück war sehr umfangreich und lecker. Highlight ist aber der infinity pool auf dem dach. Preis-leistung ist echt gut.

If i could give this place more stars, i would. My dad stayed here years ago and talks about this hotel all the time. He is elderly now and has some difficulty getting around but he wanted to come back to vietnam and this hotel in particular. We stayed eight nights and everything about this place was exceptional. The staff, food and rooms were all amazing. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed and were comfortable. The rooms were absolutely stunning, clean and comfortable. The breakfast buffet was delicious. It s walking distance to everything as well. I highly recommend this place. It might be the best all around hotel experience i ve ever had. Thank you rosaka hotel!
Avulias ja ystävällinen henkilökunta. Kiva pikku allas ylhäällä, josta talojen välistä näki merelle. Rantaan noin 200 metriä.
The hotel was located in a good place. Easy to find places to eat, markets beach. Did t like it was the tet holiday and a lot of things were closed.
Nice hotel well located for beach restaurants and shopping . Staff very helpful and friendly upgrade given on arrival ,would stay again if in naha trang
데스크 직원들이 친절하고 룸서비스도 깔끔하게 잘해주네요. 다만 샴푸나 바디샤워 같은건 개인지참하는게 좋을듯 싶습니다.
수영장은 비교적 작습니다. 가볍게 놀만한 크기이고.. 주변에 돌아다니기는 쉽네요.. 뗏기간이라 사람이 많고 원래 시세에 비해 좀 비싸게 갔네요.. 조식은 나무 기대하지 말고. 적절한 수준. 김치 있습니다.

If i could give this place more stars, i would. My dad stayed here years ago and talks about this hotel all the time. He is elderly now and has some difficulty getting around but he wanted to come back to vietnam and this hotel in particular. We stayed eight nights and everything about this place was exceptional. The staff, food and rooms were all amazing. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed and were comfortable. The rooms were absolutely stunning, clean and comfortable. The breakfast buffet was delicious. It s walking distance to everything as well. I highly recommend this place. It might be the best all around hotel experience i ve ever had. Thank you rosaka hotel!

저희가 묵었던 리조트에서 레이트 체크 아웃이 안된다 하여 출국 전날 급하게 예약했던 호텔인데 생각보다 룸컨디션도 좋았고 직원들도 넘나 친절했습니다.저희는 밤뱅기라 숙박은 못했고 잠시 쉬다가 저녁에 체크 아웃을 해야 했지만 루브탑 바와 수영장도 있고 숙박을 못한것이 넘나 아쉬울 정도였습니다ㅠ저희는 조식 포함이었는데 당일 밤뱅기를 타야했기에 체크인 하면서 우린 오늘 저녁에 뱅기를 타야해서 저녁에 체크 아웃을 해야한다고 했더니 체크아웃할때 도시락을 준비해주었습니다 감동이었어요.공항까지 그랩을 불러 가려했는데 생각보다 가격이 너무 비싸다고 호텔 직원에게 얘기했더니 직접 택시도 불러주고 가격도 딜해줘서 너무 고마웠네요 다만 발코니 문을 열면 에어컨이 꺼지는 시스템이라 좀 불편했고 길가에 있는 호텔이라 살짝 시끄러웠습니다.그것 외엔 너무 괜찮은 호텔이었어요.직원분들도 넘나 친절하고요.비싼 리조트에 있는 직원보다 훨씬 친절했습니다.담에는 꼭 투숙하고 싶은 호텔이에요
Prima hotel, personal hat tollen einsatz gezeigt -)

Whole thing is perfect. The receptionist, hotel room condition and service all of these are perfect to us. Especailly, your staff are smiling all time and give us superior kindness. I really appreciate you guys. I really miss rosaka!!

I was very disappointed with the sunrise nha trang hotel spa. It is very old and dirty. The staff are not friendly or helpful at all! the location is far from the main town and there was so much traffic noise from the road that i couldn t sleep at all! also, the shower was not strong enough and it was hard to control the cold and hot water! i booked for 3 nights but i checked out after staying 1 night! because i couldn t stand it..! i asked the concierge if i could contact hotel.com to conplain but they wouldn t let me use the phone. I left my bathroom stuff behind, and when i called to pick them up they had thrown them away! this is not a cheap hotel, so don t waste your money and ruin your holiday!

Many guest left a very good review, but i think it was just average. First, the breakfast was disappointing. Basically, it is impressive that kimchi is served, but the rest of the menu is not very varied. Because there was only one person who made omelets and pho in restaurant, we always wait long time. There was a guest who smoked a cigarette in the balcony of restaurant, but not any staff did not stop him. Standard room did not have bathtub. A similar hotel in hanoi and ho chi minh had a bathtub in standard room. This hotel is very eco-friendly hotel that air conditioner turned off even when you open the door or window. The maids in the fitness center had a very long chat. And every time the maid goes in and out, the air conditioner was turned off. Also, there was not drinkable water in fitness center. It was very annoyed.

The staff are ready to help at any given moment when called/seek after! they get together to greet us every time we walk in the door, they made us feel like we were more than just normal guests! the place is clean and comfortable. The breakfast is great!! they even upgraded my suite when i arrived! overall, this place exceeded my expectations, i will return here for my next visit in nha trang!
Topp hotell med god beliggenhet.

The best hotel of our 3 week tour of vietnam and make so amazing because of the staff every day we had contact with them asking questions and some favours and every time they bend over backwards for us and always wentbtye extra mile i would recommend this hotel on the staff alone breakfast was lovely and the pool was nice and you can watch the sunset from the back of the top floor we were also put in a room with the bestest bed i ve slept in.
Breakfast so noisily...people seem that they dont care others by talking too loud not really smart

The hotel environment and clearness are good. The staff are very nice and helpful. Breasfast is good. Need to go up about 10 steps of stair to enter the lobby. But there are always helpful staff to help with the luggage.
Helt igennem fantastisk hotel og personale. Vi giver vores aller bedste anbefaling. Hid beliggenhed for både by og strand
굉장히 친절합니다 위치도 좋습니다 스카이라운지 분위기도 좋습니다
Nice and central and quiet. Good roof top. Friendly staff, not to many russians.

The resort is not so far from city centre. Have a few shuttle bus service everyday ( yet u have to reserve 2 hrs in advance which is quite inconvenient) staff at reception but good english but not so helpful and arrogant. They served europeaen guests better. Spa reservation was horrrible, i insisted to book yet the manager told me to book when i arrive hotel. Luckily i insisted, coz when i arrived hotel, the spa was full house on that day.
전체적으로 친절하고 깨끗한 호텔 (단 조식 아쉬움) 주변에 식당,편의점 많은 좋은 위치 호텔입니다. 또 투숙하고 싶은 호텔
酒店位置很好 周围都是饭店 里车站也很近 早餐不错

Love their welcome drinks. Staffs can speak fluent english and very helpful on calling taxis. The room we have had an awesome view of the city and the gym was perfect for working out! love this hotel a lot!
总体不错 住宿条件可以 没想到酒店国人太多 毛病就是很多场合吵

Pari vuotta vanha hotelli, joten kaikki on uutta ja siistiä. Meillä oli execute-sviitti 17 kerroksessa, josta oli kivat näkymät kaupunkiin ja vuorille. Huone oli tilava ja viihtyisä ja kylvystä saattoi katsella ikkunan läpi tv tä tai maisemia! katolla oli pieni uima-allas ja muutama aurinkotuoli ja talojen välistä näkymä rannalle. Myös hääpäivämme oli huomioitu hienosti vuoteen koristelulla! miinuksena oli, että ovet ja ovien lukot pitivät kovaa meteliä ja liikenteen äänet kuuluivat huoneeseen.
Nice rooms. Area was very crowded and not what i was expecting.
海を眺めながらゆっくりした時間を過ごしたいと思いホテルを予約しました ホテルからビーチを眺めることはできません また ビーチ迄歩いて１０分程度の時間がかかります 宿泊している観光客の殆どが中国人でした
Newly innovated, friendly staff, a bit of walk to the beach. Overall, i give it 4.5 star.
Accueil irréprochable, hôtel confortable et très propre, chambres spacieuses et personnel efficace souriant et professionnel.

룸 깨끗하고 프론트 직원들 친절하고 영어 잘해요. 4박예약 했는데 룸 업그레이드 해줬어요. 하루에 두번 타월 바꿔주고 룸상태도 깨끗해요. 아이가 있어 트윈룸으로 예약하고 침대 붙여 사용하니 편안하고 좋았어요. 냉장고가 너무 약해요. 조식은 개인적인 취향이지만 쌀국수 괜찮았고 그냥 토스트에 커피한잔 마신다고 가볍게 생각하고 가심 실망 안하지만 조식부페를 기대하면 먹을거는 없어요. 5성급이 아니니 당연할지도 모르겠지만.... 위치는 여행자거리라 편리하지만 조망은 기대하면 안될 것 같아요. 바닷가에서 꽤 안쪽으로 들어와요.

I stayed 3 nights with my family. Everything was so good except for just one point - there was some noise at night from outside pub/restaurant around the hotel. Definitely would like to recommend this hotel to anyone i know.

번화한 거리에 있어서 주변이 시끄럽고 지저분하다. 조식은 정말 먹을것이 없었고.. 첫날 배딩에서 꿉꿉한 냄새가 나서 실망. 옥외풀은 수영할수 있는사이즈는 아니고 그냥 몸만 담글수 있는 정도. 객실 상태는 전반적으로 좋다. 둘째날 새로 갈아준 배딩은 청결했고 번화한 거리에 익숙해지니 맛집들도 가깝고 해변도 가까워서 좋았다. 이틀자면서 구경하고 먹으러 다니고 마사지 받고 조용한 리조트로 이동하니 천국이 따로 없다.

由於朋友的推薦 訂了此酒店 到了芽莊 機場直接到酒店45分鐘車程 一進大堂職員nam立即為我們送上可口的當地冰茶 當天前台的美女很快為我們換了有陽台的兩張單人床客房 因為出發前訂錯雙人床 效率高 nam幫我們送行李到房間 還介紹風筒 保險箱等使用 十分細心 笑容親切 另外 不得不提 酒店位置十分理想 走5分鐘就到海濱沙灘 前後左右有很多餐廳酒吧 幾間網紅餐廳走10分鐘即到 天台的無邊泳池也是很好的享受 1月18日中午我們在游池bar休息 美女服務生用心製作的新鮮果汁好喝 有位高高瘦瘦的帥哥服務生還為了我們拍照美觀 加了藍色的酒 小陽傘 十分貼心 有機會還會入住這家酒店
무료로 업그레이드 해주고 조식도 맛있어요! 해변에서는 조금 걸어야하지만 멀지는 않고 적당한 위치에 있습니다.
직원들도 매우 친절했으며, 나트랑에 다시간다면 다시 묵고싶은 호텔입니다 접근성도 좋았으며 작지만 루프탑 수영장도 마음에 들었습니다!!!!!! 너무 너무 만족스러웠던 호텔입니다!!!!!
최고였습니다 나트랑 가장 번화가인 여행자거리에있고 나트랑비치랑도 가까와 호텔에서 비치타올빌려서 나가놀다 돌아와 씻고 여행자거리를 돌아다니며 베트남 나트랑을 즐기면서 최고의 시간을 보냈습니다 직원들의 친절함이 더욱 빛났던곳입니다 꼭 다시 오고싶은 곳 나트랑 이고 호텔입니다

Das hotel ist gut ausgestattet und das personal freundlich und kompetent. Der pool mit infinity-blick ist ganz schön. Die umgebung war nicht ganz so toll. Zum strand ca. 500 m durch das übliche verkehrsgewühl. Dann am strand unbedingt das restaurant saling club besuchen.
Best service we have been received. All the staff are keen to give us a hand and help at all time. Highly recommended.
직원들이 엄청 친절했고 시내 가운데라 접근성이 좋았음 하지만 나트랑의 뷰를 살리지 못한 위치 수영장의 뷰는 좋았으나 사진용 수영장임.

We loved our stay at rosaka, having stayed for 7 nights we got a real good view of the property and it s functions. The pool and bar area was great, however, what you see in photos isn t exactly what you get - as there are now high rises in front of the building blocking the view of the ocean. The buffet breakfast was good too, room comfort was great. The only downside was even on the 12th floor we could hear all the noises of the busy main streets. As for the staff, they were wonderful, however we didn t appreciate on our last two days seeing a staff member behind the bar cutting theirs toenails next to the fruit used in the cocktails, and another staff member eating from the buffet breakfast behind the counter. Otherwise, we thought it was great - good location!
직원들이 매우 친절합니다 옥상 풀장은 작지만 사용자가 거의 없어 불편은 없고, 조식 메뉴는 평범한 비지니스 호텔수준입니다
A really nice hotel, great staff, good breakfast, nice pool
Great location and nice rooms. Wi fi good

I did throughly enjoy my stay here at the rosaka. The staff were great and friendly. The pool was lovely and a sun trap. The views from rooftop pool/bar were amazing. Only downside we were facing the road and low down so it was rather loud during the morning. Good area for a few bars restaurants.
Hotel was very good. Nha trang was disappointing
Good location to downtown nha trang, can walk to the beach, breakfast at the rooftop restaurant was excellent. Will stay again
직원들이 매우친절하고 조식은 먹을게 별로없었습니다 쌀국수와 오믈렛이 가장 맛있었구여 룸업그레이드되어서 잘쉬다왔습니다 위치는 좋은편이고 도보로 이용가능한 맛집이 많았습니다

지역에 어디 가볼만한 곳을 물어볼때나 접시가 사고싶어 물어볼 때도 정말 친절하게 응대해주었고 새벽비행기를 타야해서 짐을 맡겨둘 때도 너무 친절하고 중간에 조금 더 추가해도 선뜻 맡아줘서 너무 고마웠다. 다만 스파의 경우 베트남 마사지로 90분을 진행했는데 너무 간지럽기만해서 그부분은 조금 아쉽다. 공항으로 가는 택시도 불려줬는데 300이라고해서 알겠다고 한 후 남은 돈을 다쓰고 공항가는데 택시기사가 돈을 갑자기 더 달라고 해서 난감했지만 이것은 호텔 잘못이 아니니까... 돈 더 내고 그냥 편히 그랩 잡아도 됐을듯. 근처에 바다도 가깝고 관광지나 식당도 많고 인피니트 풀도 작지만 좋았고 조식도 나쁘지 않았다. 다음에 나트랑을 또 간다면 여기서 다시 묶고 싶다는 생각을 한 곳

När man ser bilderna hotellet presenterar får man intrycket att inget finns mellan hotellet o havet. Dock finns där ganska många byggnader. Restaurangen bredvid hotellet började brinna o inte förrän jag uppmanade hotellpersonalen tryckte man på brandlarmet så hotellet kunde evakueras. Området kändes mycket fattigt o viss personal från omkringliggande klubbar kunde bli mycket närgångna för att man skulle komma in till dem.

Mycket fräscht, nybyggt hotell (ca 2 år) med supertrevlig personal. Alla verkar trivas och vi blev bemötta med stor vänlighet, omtanke och service hela tiden. Vi blev uppgraderade till ett rum med havsutsikt (delvis skymd av nybyggen, men med riktigt fin utsikt ändå). Sköna, lyxiga sängar. Supertyst ac. Läget är perfekt, nära stranden och även nära till liv och rörelse, restauranger etc. Vi bokade först en vecka och upplevelsen var så bra att vi valde att förlänga ytterligare några dagar i stället för att resa vidare som vi ofta gör annars. Underbar frukostbuffé som vi dock inte utnyttjade annat än frukt och grönsaker eftersom vi är veganer. Restaurangen ordnade dessutom med andra allternativ speciellt till oss, och vi fick precis allt vi önskade oss (till och med havregrynsgröt som ibland kan vara svårt att få tag på i asien).

With out a doubt, the best hotel i ve stayed at while in vietnam. The facilities, staff and breakfasts were better than expected. I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone going to nha trang. This was my second visit and when i go again to nha trang i wouldn t stay anywhere but here. I m an american currently living in phoenix, arizona, who is on a spiritual journey to clear my heart and sole from my time as a soldier during the 1970s. A difficult journey for me, but made so much easier by my stay here.

The hotel and even more the staff of the hotel made what turned out to be too many days in one place much more pleasant. The hotel is well positioned, well equipped and has staff that are second to none! very well recommended!

Fantastiskt bra hotell som vi först bokade en vecka och därefter ytterligare tre dagar (i stället för att resa vidare som vi brukar). Mycket vänlig och hjälpsam personal, härlig frukostbuffé, sköna sängar, havsutsikt m.m. Bara positivt!!
룸상태 깨끗하고 직원들 친철합니다

The staff were very friendly and very helpful. The breakfast was delicious. We were very happy with the hotel and pleasant staff. The only negative was that when we left to go to the airport the taxi fare wasn t negotiated do we paid a lot more than anticipated.
숙소위치와 서비스가 좋았습니다 조식도 맛있고 수영장은 좀 작은데 나쁘지 않았습니다 다만 즁꾹인들이 좀 많아서 시끄러워요

This was my second stay at the rosaka nha trang, and once again, everything was fine. The hotel is clean and the rooms are spacious and nice, and still look new. The gym is adequate and the breakfast buffet is reasonably good. The location is very good, the beach is nearby and restaurants, bars, shops, massage, and other amenities are close by, as well. Staff are friendly. Recommended for all travelers visiting nha trang.
泳池景色很美 員工友善細心 房間清潔整齊
1)酒店人員有禮貌 (特別是進門服務員_忘記他的名,他英文很好 問他往機場的巴士站位置時 他親身帶領指示位置 非常細心) 2) 房間清潔(但洗手間有蟻) 3) 早餐很豐富 湯河特別美味 4) 酒店位置方便 5) 游泳池雖然小 但境觀很好 6) 入住手續 及退房也迅速
가성비 곳입니다
매우 친절하고 모든일을 도와 주려고 노력 하는모습이 보기 좋았음

2018年8月に5泊しました ホテルの立地はニャチャン市街地内で繁華街にも出やすく 売店やマッサージ店も近くにあります 眼の前の通りは車通りが多くクラクションの音が聞こえますが チャンフー通りに比べれば大幅に静かで寝るには問題ありませんでした また 目の前にミュージックライブをしている店がありましたが 夜10時には完全に静かになります 部屋の防音も十分で 隣の部屋からの音は全く聞こえませんでした 朝ごはんはブッフェスタイルで毎日少しずつメニューが変わります フォーやオムレツはその場で調理してくれるので 大満足でした 屋上のプールはあまり大きくはありませんが 眺めはよく タオルもその場で借りられるので気軽に寛げます インフィニティプールのようですが 海までにいくらか他のホテルがあるので 完全にビーチを眺めることはできません それでも間からはきれいな海と空が眺められます 宿泊は中国人とロシア人が半々くらいの比率で 騒がしい感じはあまりありませんでした ホテルのスタッフによるサービスは素晴らしく いつも温かい笑顔で迎えてくれました オプショナルツアーのバスが遅れたときなどのトラブルも 円滑に解決していただけました 英語が通じるスタッフも揃っていました
Excellent staffs help
전반적인 서비스는 마음에 들었으나, 리셉션 직원들끼리 고객앞에서 알아들을 수 없는 언어로 웃으면서 이야기해서 불쾌했던 기억이 있습니다. 다음날 수퍼바이저에게 얘기를 했고 사과를 받아 기분이 좀 풀리긴 했습니다만, 실망스러웠습니다. 그 직원들만 아니었어도 100점만점에 200점을 주었을텐데. 아쉽습니다.
Nice, but little bit tô far to the ocean.
From our arrival to departure the staff where helpful and friendly and went out their way to make us comfortable
地理位置佳,附近餐廳很多,離海灘也不遠.

The location is great because it only took us 5 minutes walk from the hotel to the beach. The breakfast was tasty and great. The staff were really helpful and gave us a lot of useful information. Will recommend to anyone who is traveling to nha trang!

What was good the hotel kindly upgraded our room to help celebrate our anniversary. This was much appreciated along with all the special touches of roses and petals. The pool - it was clean with a nice view, small and able to get crowded when busy and the rinsing showers didn t work. The room was clean, well appointed and bed comfortable. Overall a sense of luxury. Not so good noisy at night with banging doors from the neighbours breakfast selection only ok and the restaurant had absolutely no atmosphere but lots of loud chinese coughing and spitting - hard to escape overall a very nice hotel in very busy and grubby city - provided us an escape from it all.
The hotel is very clean, well-managed, and accessible to the beach, other major tourist attractions, and good restaurants. And the staff is also very great and professional.
Right in downtown of nha trang. Everything around is walkable.
Dicht bij eetgelegenheden, strand en geeft goed onbijt, mooi zwembad en goede spa
전반적으로 깔끔하고, 깨끗했습니다. 직원분들도 친절하고 영어로 소통이 가능하여 큰 불편없었습니다.

After check-in, we had entered the room which smells moisture/mildew we could not find any water-glass in the bathroom so i went downstair and the old lady was upset about the maid ( who forgot to put in the water glass ) and quickly gave me a mug she found in a pile of glassware i did not look at the mug but as i reached my room , my wife was upset showed me the dark matters at the bottom of the mug. So i went downstair a second time and the old lady , with a cold face , told me to grab another mug sitting on top of a water fountain .... And that mug was probably used the whole day already.... I was so upset about it politely told the old lady to forget about the water-glass or mug ... There was no sense of service in that old lady. The next day, we checked out ( even we had prepaid for 5 days ) it was a bad hotel and the old couple has no sense of service and the facilities are in such bad shape and need upgrades improvements. Unless drastic improvements are made, it would be a great disservice to future customers of hotels.com.
Fantastic stay, great staff, had a great time during my stay at seaside hotel
Terrible
Stuff dont speak english. Everything else is very good
Good hotel located close to beach, but stuff doesn t speak english

Beskrivningen på hotels stämmer tyvärr inte överens med verkligheten. Det finns varken takterass eller egen balkong. Rummet vi fick var fullt av myror och kylskåpet mögligt. Vi påtalade att rummet inte hade några handdukar och fick ett par riktigt slitna illaluktande trasor . Dessutom var sängarna de hårdaste vi någonsin känt. Att ingen kommenterat detta tidigare är otroligt. Sov hellre på stranden. Vi tackade för oss och checkade ut redan efter ett par timmar.
Close to the beach and russian quarters in an alley were there were lots of noise du to construction work. Staff helpful but not so good at english.
格安だったので宿泊しましたが 2度と泊まることはないと思います 部屋は全体的に清掃されておらず シーツも汚れていました フロントの方は優しかったですが 英語が通じません

他のホテルを予約していたのに ホテルの手違いで部屋があいておらず 現地で前日予約しました オーナーさんが高齢で インターネット予約そのものをきちんと理解していなかった為 パソコン上で予約確認ができないと言い チェックアウトの際に預けておいたパスポートをスムーズに返却してもらえませんでした 結果的には ちゃんと宿泊でき パスポートも返してくれましたが 日本語はおろか 英語も通じなかったので少々苦労しました

Wir hatten das hotel vormittags gebucht. Check inn sollte um 14 uhr sein. Dort angekommen hielt man uns bis 22 uhr hin, um uns dann mitzuteilen dass es keine freien zimmer gab. Der inhaber konnte kein englisch und war total überfordert!

You should delete them from your service as they blamed you saying you werent paying for no-shows. They think later than 6pm is a no show and wouldnt give me refund until you pay them. Your support team is looking into it ?

At the reception the guy was playing his smart phone and kicked us out said no reservation no room . Even didn t check e-mail or smth. Was really absolutely impolite!!! it was extremely difficult to find this hotel. We were trying to call them but nobody answer. So never book this hotel ever! better sleep at the beach will save your time, money and nerves.

The hotel was not accept the booking online anymore. The location on map was incorrect. The real location is not on the main tranphu street, you need to ask many people about this hotel because it is not well-known. The hotel is on the end of small street away from tranphu street about 500m away. This hotel is family business - so it should named as guesthouse rather than hotel, and no one speak english. Seaside 1 and seaside 2 hotel are in one old building.
Da depennare dal sito , ne va della vostra reputazione!

Achtung abzocke! nachdem wir mitbekamen, dass reservierungen in eigenregie storniert wurden( d. Das hotel) wurde uns schon mulmig. Unsere reservierung mussten wir uns aus einem stapel blätter selbst raussuchen. Danach war warten an der reihe. Nachdem dieses spiel mit ca. 8 anderen paaren/ gruppen usw. Betrieben wurde, war ein kleiner spaziergang zum nächsten herberge angesagt. Dort hat uns das hotel eingecheckt und hier sollten wir nun bleiben. Definitiv ein upgrade jedoch auch das geld nicht wert. Weitere infos warum/wieso/weshalb und was passiert gab es während der ca 2 std. Gespanntem warten nicht. Fazit dieses hotel bucht zimmer in anderen hotels, wir hatten hierbei noch glück im unglück, und verkauft diese zu überteuerten preisen weiter. Da in nha trang leider die hotelkapazitäten knapp sind und selbst in der nebensaison, kurzfristig nichts zu bekommen ist haben diese betrüger leichtes spiel. Bitte nicht buchen und damit betrug nicht unterstützen.
Đã thanh toán tiền qua hotels.com mà lễ tân nói chưa nhận đựợc thanh toán nên phải phone cho hotels.com giải quyết.
Tại sao thu tiền chúng toi qua mạng mà ks vẫn lấy tiền của tôi
I was so satisfied with all conditions and i would like to appreciate your kindness.
직원들은 모두 매우 친절하며 세심하게 챙겨주었습니다. 방안에서 쿰쿰한 냄새가 살짝 나는게 단점이긴 하지만 다음 여행에도 무조건 여기입니다.
직원분들이 친절하고 침구도 푹신하고 편안합니다.

나트랑 해변 및 상권이 대부분 호텔 주변에 있어 상당히 만족스럽고, 청결은 대부분 동남아 호텔과 비슷하게 세심한 곳까지는 부족함. 가족들과 함께 하기는 가격 및 주변 환경 등 최적의 휴양호텔
대체적으로 만족했습니다. 숙소가 오래되어서 낡은 느낌이 조금 있었지만, 대체로 청결하고, 직원들의 서비스는 아주 만족스러웠어요. 데스크와 레스토랑에 있던 한국스텝분들 너무 친절하셨고, 레이트체크아웃신청한시간보다 조금 일찍 체크아웃했더니 시간대별로 추가요금을 깍아주신점.. 너무 사려깊었습니다.
스탭분들이 친절합니다. 아침 부페는 사람이 붐비는 경우가 많아서 덜 혼잡한 시간에 가는 것이 좋아요.

((많진않지만 해외 15개국이상 경험 및 현재 묵고있는 빈원더스 내 숙소( 리조트)와 비교결과)) 한국인 매니저님의 친절함이 최대의 장점입니다. 한국인이 계셔도 카톡까지 보내주시면서 챙겨주시는 호텔은 처음 봤습니다. 덕분에 기분도 좋았고, 다음일정 때문에 바쁘게 체크아웃 할 때도 최대한 저희입장에서 도와주셔서 여행 잘 다니고 있습니다. 어르신들과 오시거나 의사소통이 힘들다면 쉐라톤 적극추천드립니다. 조식 등 식당 빈원더스 대비 매우만족(고수취향, 쌀국수, 메뉴, 커피의 맛 모두 고려하신 티가 납니다.) 헬스장과 사우나 저는 유산소해서 땀내기 좋았지만 다른 분들은 조금 더워 했습니다. 수영장 빈원더스 내 뷰가 더 좋긴 하지만 나트랑 북부 중심부 해안가 호텔들 중 뷰나 조명도가 2손가락안에 듭니다. 루프탑 바 야경을 즐기기에 좋고, 메뉴도 무난했습니다. 대부분의 바에서 판매하는 안주류를 추가한다면 더 좋지 않을까 싶습니다. 숙소상태나 뷰 깔끔하고 특히 침구류 상태가 매우 좋습니다. 룸서비스나 청소상태 매우 양호한 편이라 아주 잘 잤습니다. 전반적으로 매우만족한 숙소입니다. 감사합니다!

Every time i am back in vietnam, i made a trip to nha trang city since i love this city. This is my first time to stay at the sheraton (i stayed at the intercontinental twice and at the best western havana twice before the covid-19). My review is based on my experiences with the intercontinental hotel next to the sheraton. Overall i am very pleased and happy with the hotel and the hotel staffs. Since they are competing to each other, both hotel are having almost identical services and trying to make guests to be happy during their stay. I would say that the intercontinental is better but not a lot if i have to choose between the two hotel, i will choose the sheraton. What i like hotel staffs, breakfast area and staffs, the swimming pool, the security guards in the 2nd basement, the view from the room, the quiet, the cleanliness, the club lounge and staffs. What need to be improved (1) telephone is not working in the suite (2) lights inside the suite need to be checked to make sure they are lighted up, (3) carpet in the suite is too old, (4) the auto mode of the two central air controllers in the suite is not working so they keep both the ac fans running 24/24 at high speed and noisy (5) the front desk did not offer a courtesy call asking guest if need assistant with luggage at check out time i hope to be back.

욕조에서 침실을 지나 바다로 시선이 연결될 만큼 전망이 좋습니다. 객실은 청결하고 조식도 만족스럽습니다. 조식먹고 화장실에 있는데 하우스키핑이 생각보다 빨리와서 좀 놀람. 한국인 여자 직원도 있어서 그분 근무중에는 의사소통이 너무 편하구요. 다른 직원들도 영어가 유창해서 불편함이 없습니다. 뭔가 문의하면 성심껏 도와주려는 태도가 더욱 만족스럽고 작은 문제가 생겨도 금방 해결되겠구나 하고 안심하게 만들어 줍니다.마침 바람이 세게 불어와 수영장은 사용하지 않았지만 헬스장 시설은 준수하고 관리가 잘 되어 있습니다. 루프탑 바의 전망과 음료 역시 최고입니다. 딱 하나. 룸 안의 책상 서랍이 기울어졌는지 헐거운지 자꾸 혼자 밀려나왔습니다만 크게 신경쓰이진 않았습니다. 여러모로 최고의 경험이었습니다. 냐짱에 다시 방문한다면 또 이용할 것입니다.

가족여행으로 나트랑 선택 후 숙소가 고민일 때 지인 중 항공사 파일럿 통해 추천받아 이용했는데요 역시나 친절하고 세심한 서비스가 인상적인 곳 이더라고요 총괄 쉐프 영업덕분인지 입맛에 잘 맞던 음식에 편안한 침실 등등 좋기만한 기억으로 나트랑 쉐라톤을 기억하고, 연말 계획중인 재방문시에도 다시 이용하겠습니다

뷰가 너무너무너무 좋았음. 밤에 테라스 나가서 파도소리들으면서 야경보는 재미가 있었음. 낮에도 좋음. 수영장 깔끔 깨끗함. 수영장뷰도 완벽 조식 너어어어무 맛있고 종류도많아서 좋음 향신료 쎄지않고, 반미도 종류별로 3가지정도 있으면서 고수를 뺀반미, 고수넣은 반미 이런식으로 배려가 보임. 맛있게 잘먹었음. 서비스 별다섯개 별 열개주고싶음. 직원들 너무너무 다 친절하고 서비스 왕좋음. 다음에 나트랑을 또 가게된다면 또 쉐라톤에서 지내고싶음.

Một trải nghiệm tồi tệ nhất. Tôi cũng chả làm khách sạn cũng chả muốn phá ai. Nhưng mà từ cách nước của nhân viên đến cách phản hồi của từng bộ phận. Hy vọng mọi khách hàng có sự lựa chọn thông thái đối với ksan mình lựa chọn khi đi du lịch. Tôi cũng may mắn được đến nhiều nơi và cũng trải nghiệm được nhiều dịch vụ nhưng xin phép chưa thấy một khách sạn nào có cách giao tiếp với kh tệ như vầy. Tôi đã sợ vì mình từ sài gòn đến nt muộn. Nên đã boôking luôn cả ngày thứ 6 ( chiều 17h mình mới xuất phát từ sài gòn đến nt thì xe di chuyển đến tầm 2h30-3h sáng) mình đến khách sạn nhận phòng. Xin lỗi nhưng mình thanh toán ngày thứ 6 qua thứ 7 rồi thì mình đến lúc nào cũng được mà. Sao lại nói mình đến muộn giờ check in ??? thêm nữa bên bạn chính là sai trước bên bạn đã extra nhưng không đúng với commit bạn đầu. Thì lại chửi kh chưa hết nhân viên các bạn còn nt chửi kh chem chẽm. Mình du di gửi email để nhắc nhở thì các bạn có hành động nói kh muốn phá ks. Xin lỗi chúng tôi là khách du lịch chúng tôi đi du lịch chứ chúng tôi không phải đối thủ cạnh tranh rãnh mà đi phá các bạn. Hy vọng mọi người có suy nghĩ thông thái khi đặt khách sạn này. Cảm ơn

Khách sạn nằm ở vị trí chiến lược, gần đền po nagar. Mọi thứ đều tốt, một nơi thoải mái và rộng rãi để ở. Về mặt tích cực, tôi muốn khen ngợi sự kiên nhẫn và dịch vụ ngoài dặm được cung cấp bởi quầy lễ tân-dhu / tu, anh ấy đã giúp chúng tôi trong chuyến đi không ngừng nghỉ.

Phòng thứ hai với một giường đôi là tốt vì ban đầu họ cho tôi một phòng hai giường, không theo đặt phòng của tôi. Phòng đầu tiên thậm chí không có đầu vòi hoa sen thích hợp và giường rất nhỏ kiểm tra là tốt nhưng họ thường sẽ cố gắng để cung cấp một phòng không mong muốn tệ hại, phong cách điển hình.

Khách sạn rộng rãi, nhân viên nhiệt tình, vị trí rất gần trung tâm, tiện đi lại, nhiều nơi rất tiện đi bộ từ 15 đổ lại. Vị trí gần biển rất tiện cho việc đi dạo biển
Nhân viên chu đáo, rất nhiệt tình. Tôi sẽ nghỉ tại khách sạn này khi đi về nha trang công tác.

Vị trí gần trung tâm, gần tháp trầm hương nên di chuyển rất thuận tiện. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Tiện nghi phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, đủ tiện nghi. Khách sạn có hồ bơi, nhà hàng, cafe, xung quanh khu vực có cafe, spa, tiệm bánh. Đồ ăn sáng (buffet) tạm ổn, khá hài lòng, số lượng món chưa đa dạng lắm.

Ưu điểm ngay vị trí trung tâm đi lại thuận tiện, khách sạn thiết kế đẹp và không gian rất rộng, phong cách indochina khác biệt nhược điểm vòi sen khá bé, tắm không thoải mái, buffee ăn sáng chủ yếu là bánh mì set đồ tây có thể do khách tây nhiều, đồ việt ko đặc sắc lắm, mình ưng mỗi món cháo trứng muối

너무 좋았습니다. 방도 깨끗 조식도 좋음 직원들 친절함
오래된 호텔이긴 하지만 시내 접근성 좋고 골목 안이어서 조용하였음 조식은 별로 였는데 쌀국수 국물은 좋았음.
호텔가 시내라서 접근성이 좋습니다. 건물은 깨끗하고 숙소는 깔끔하며 매일매일 새집처럼 청소를 해줬어요. 조식은 다양하게 매일 조금씩 바뀌니 지루하지않았습니다. 직원들은 모두 친절했습니다. 재방문 100 나짱 방문하겠다는 사람들에게 꼭 추천해주고 싶은 숙소입니다. 최고에요
조용하고 깨끗합니다. 시내에 위치해 있어서 위치상으로도 좋습니다. 또한 루프탑 수영장도 좋습니다. 나트랑에 다시 온다면 재방문 의사가 있습니다. 직원분들이 엄청 친절하세요!
Perfect location near everything . Amazing staff. Clean and safe . Everything you need in a hotel .
시내에 있어서 위치가 좋고 놀러 다니는데 짐도 맡아주고 직원들이 친절해서 좋았습니다. 비행기가 늦게 도착해 다음날 시내를 돌아다니려고 하루만 머문 곳인데 가격대비 조식도 양호했어요.
가격 대비 매우 좋습니다. 위치도 좋고 조식도 잘 나오고
5박으로 묵었던 호텔 공항 픽업도 신청해 새벽 2시에 편안히 숙소까지 갈수있었고 방도 바꿔줘서 편하게 지내다 왔어요.. 역시나 망고 맛집이었어요
호텔이 살짝 골목 안쪽에 있어 크게 시끄럽지 않음. 나트랑 시내와 굉장히 가까워서 밤에 야시장이나 길거리를 돌아다니기 굉장히 좋습니다

Mình có thuê 1 phòng tại đây để tắm khi đi đảo về và đợi xe trung chuyển đến rước. Ban đầu mình thuê 1 phòng trên app. Sau thuê thêm 1 phòng cho bạn đi chung. Mình nói khoảng từ 17h đến 20h tối. Đợi xe đến rước. Khách sạn lấy tiền bằng 1 ngày thuê. Trong khi xe chưa đến rước ks lại hối bạn mình trả phòng vì lúc vào nói khoảng 20h. Bạn mình phải xuống phòng mình ở nhờ. Thái độ chủ khách sạn rất tệ.
Phòng quá cũ, quá bẩn, điều hòa kêu to không chỉnh được, toilet bẩn không có vòi xịt. Ông bà chủ già, không biết khách đặt qua app.
Chủ nhà thân thiện. Phòng có gián chết dưới gầm giường và không được sạch sẽ lắm.
